Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Dermaseptin-H3 (Dermaseptin-like peptide 3, DMS3; Frogs, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Phyllomedusa azurea (Orange-legged monkey frog) (Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis azurea)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Dermaseptin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli;Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus, Micrococcus luteus.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: Probably acts by disturbing membrane functions with its amphipathic structure (By similarity).

Literature.Title: A combined mass spectrometric and cDNA sequencing approach to the isolation and characterization of novel antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of Phyllomedusa hypochondrialis azurea.
Literature.Author: Thompson AH, Bjourson AJ, Orr DF, Shaw C, McClean S.
